speaker: Samuel Jenkins (Head of the group)
utterance: Let's now turn our attention to the travel dates. Given our budget of $1500, when would it be most cost-effective to visit Italy?

speaker: Andrew Simmons (Financial Advisor)
utterance: Travelling during Italy's off-peak tourism season, roughly from October to April, can be the most cost-effective. However, let's avoid holidays too.

speaker: Jennifer Beckins (Event Coordinator)
utterance: Andrew makes a good point. Let's aim for late October or early November for the group trip to avoid peak prices yet bypass major holidays.

utterance: Let's shift our discussion towards identifying flight options. We should consider direct versus layover flights, arrival-free days, and the most cost-effective days to travel.
